exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros m l k am ak H1 H2 H3 H4 Hak Hl Hk Hakkdiv. split. - intros [q' Hdiv]. destruct H4 as [q [Hinv Heq]]. rewrite Heq in Hdiv. apply divides_mult_inv with (k:=q) in Hdiv. + exists (q' * q). rewrite Nat.mul_comm. auto. + apply Hak. - intros [q' Hdiv]. destruct H4 as [q [Hinv Heq]]. rewrite <- Heq. apply divides_mult_inv with (k:=q) in Hdiv. + exists (q' * q). rewrite Nat.mul_comm. auto. + apply Hak.
